channel.title: Need a little help plz
channel.description:
ok so i started with ricscape version 3.. all the objects worked before all i did was change the addglobalobject cords to a new location and they dont appear. is there anyway to fix this..
and how do you make it say [username] has logged out instead of has logged in.... dont matter if its client or server sided i still wanna know how to fix this.
another thing i wanna know is how to make a weapon for admin only[br][size=1]Posted on: November 15, 2007, 08:51:00 PM[/size][hr]um lil help lolx last time i made this topic no 1 helped me =\

only thing i wanna fix is the friends chat… =\

item.title: Need a little help plz
item.dc:creator: @hippie hippie
item.description:
@hippie wrote:

[quote=“xxdanxx135, post:2, topic:158618”]if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“USERNAME”))
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = “message (…)”;

and about the global object thing you might not be typing the cordinates in correctly becuase they should appear [b]after you compile[b]!

[b]~dan :D[b][/quote]
How bout, on the run methed, just have
playerHandler.sendMessagetoall(“blah blah blah” +player+ " blah blah blah");

Read full topic
